desc: The skilled women artisans are provided with fair pay, bank accounts, & hot meals. These women are given opportunity to empower themselves which is truly the backbone of 3 Girls Gifts Inc.’s mission.

layout.text: Fair Trade, Handmade, & Fabulous Jewelry & Gifts From Around The World
Our jewelry comes from Brazil, Italy, Argentina, Holland, Japan, Spain, Nepal, Greece, France, & The United States
